attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The paparazzi and their torrid trade is a menace to society.
They pursue, victimise and hound people, constantly, in order to take photographs to sell to magazines.
So we call for the criminalisation, or failing that, the banning of press photographers taking pictures of people in order to sell on.
Add to it that these photographs splashed in the media create insecurity in young people, there is no case whatsover for the continued trade in celebrity photographs.
Do the country some good and banish this menace forever, so we don't have to view these irrelevant images of celebrities, famous people and images in the 'gutter' press, and prevent hounding of people.
